Author: MissNietzsche
Text: I have a strong aversion to alcohol. When I was first learning how to purge and I thought my epiglottis was my uvula, I'd take a bit of alcohol and hold it to my nose to make me gag.

Author: killveemaim
Text: Not pathetic. I eat out to avoid purging often.. try to remind yourself that youâ€™re so worth taking care of, even when you feel alone.
